Class OpeningHoursDTO

java.lang.Object
common.dto.OpeningHoursDTO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OpeningHoursDTO extends Object implements Serializable
DTO representing restaurant opening hours.

Supports both:

  • Regular weekly hours (by day of week)
  • Special date exceptions (specific calendar dates)
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • OpeningHoursDTO

      public OpeningHoursDTO()
      Required no-args constructor for serialization

    • OpeningHoursDTO

      public OpeningHoursDTO(int hoursId, String dayOfWeek, String openTime, String closeTime, boolean isSpecial, String specialDate)
      Constructs a full opening-hours entry.
      Parameters:
      hoursId - unique record ID
      dayOfWeek - day name or "Special"
      openTime - opening time (HH:mm)
      closeTime - closing time (HH:mm)
      isSpecial - true if this is a special-date entry
      specialDate - specific date (yyyy-MM-dd), or null
